Anime and Games Comments

ANIMazer Feb 17, 2015

I¬¥ll just finished watching this anime and it was pretty cool. It¬¥s kind of a violent and bloody murder mystery mixed with some occult stuff. It also has some interesting characters and a few scary girls with supernatural powers. These girls will probably give you some chills from time to time. I really liked this anime so I will send it directly to my favorites list. I¬¥ll hope I can find some more series like this one eventually.
